title.en: Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu
title.raw: 《吳王濞列傳》 Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu

sentences.zh: 吳王濞者，高帝兄劉仲之子也。

translations.literal: King Wu Bi was the son of Liu Zhong, Emperor Gao's elder brother.

sentences.zh: 高帝已定天下七年，立劉仲為代王。

translations.literal: Seven years after Emperor Gao pacified the realm, he enfeoffed Liu Zhong as King of Dai.

sentences.zh: 而匈奴攻代，劉仲不能堅守，棄國亡，閒行走雒陽，自歸天子。

translations.literal: But the Xiongnu attacked Dai, Liu Zhong could not hold firm, abandoned his kingdom and fled, secretly traveled to Luoyang, and surrendered to the emperor.

sentences.zh: 天子為骨肉故，不忍致法，廢以為郃陽侯。

translations.literal: For the sake of flesh and blood relations, the emperor could not bear to execute him, demoted him to Marquis of Heyang.

sentences.zh: 高帝十一年秋，淮南王英布反，東并荊地，劫其國兵，西度淮，擊楚，高帝自將往誅之。

translations.literal: In autumn of Emperor Gao's eleventh year, King Ying Bu of Huainan rebelled, to the east annexed Jing territory, seized his state troops, crossed the Huai west, attacked Chu, Emperor Gao personally led troops to execute him.

sentences.zh: 劉仲子沛侯濞年二十，有氣力，以騎將從破布軍蘄西，會甀，布走。

translations.literal: Liu Zhong's son Marquis Bi of Pei was twenty years old, had strength, as cavalry general followed to defeat Bu's army at Qixi, met at Pi, Bu fled.

sentences.zh: 荊王劉賈為布所殺，無後。

translations.literal: King Liu Jia of Jing was killed by Bu, had no heir.

sentences.zh: 上患吳、會稽輕悍，無壯王以填之，諸子少，乃立濞於沛為吳王，王三郡五十三城。

translations.literal: The emperor worried Wu and Huiji were fierce and tough, had no strong king to fill them, all sons were young, so enfeoffed Bi at Pei as King of Wu, ruling three commanderies and fifty-three cities.

sentences.zh: 已拜受印，高帝召濞相之，謂曰：「若狀有反相。」

translations.literal: Yi bai shou yin, Gao Di zhao Bi xiang it, wei yue: "Ru zhuang have fan xiang."
translations.idiomatic: After receiving the seal, Emperor Gao summoned Bi to look at him and said: "Your appearance has rebellious features."

sentences.zh: 心獨悔，業已拜，因拊其背，告曰：「漢後五十年東南有亂者，豈若邪？

translations.literal: Xin du hui, ye yi bai, yin fu qi bei, gao yue: "Han hou fifty years dong nan have luan person, qi ru xie?
translations.idiomatic: He regretted in his heart, but the appointment was already made, so he patted his back and warned: "Fifty years after Han, if there is chaos in the southeast, would it be you?

sentences.zh: 然天下同姓為一家也，慎無反！」

translations.literal: Ran tian xia tong xing wei yi jia, shen wu fan!"
translations.idiomatic: But the realm's same surname is one family, be careful not to rebel!"

sentences.zh: 濞頓首曰：「不敢。」

translations.literal: Bi dun shou yue: "Bu gan."
translations.idiomatic: Bi kowtowed and said: "I dare not."

sentences.zh: 會孝惠、高后時，天下初定，郡國諸侯各務自拊循其民。

translations.literal: During Emperor Hui and Empress Gao periods, the realm was newly pacified, commandery and kingdom feudal lords each diligently comforted and governed their people.

sentences.zh: 吳有豫章郡銅山，濞則招致天下亡命者（益）［盜］鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，以故無賦，國用富饒。

translations.literal: Wu have Yu zhang jun tong shan, Bi then zhao zhi tian xia wang ming person (yi) [dao] zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, yi gu wu fu, guo yong fu rao.
translations.idiomatic: Wu had the copper mountain of Yuzhang commandery, Bi then summoned the realm's fugitives to cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, therefore no taxes, state wealth abundant.

sentences.zh: 孝文時，吳太子入見，得侍皇太子飲博。

translations.literal: During Emperor Wen's time, the Wu crown prince entered to see the emperor, got to serve drinking and gaming with the imperial crown prince.

sentences.zh: 吳太子師傅皆楚人，輕悍，又素驕，博，爭道，不恭，皇太子引博局提吳太子，殺之。

translations.literal: The Wu crown prince's tutors were all Chu people, fierce and tough, moreover habitually arrogant, gaming, disputed the way, not respectful, the imperial crown prince pulled the gaming board and beat the Wu crown prince to death.

sentences.zh: 於是遣其喪歸葬。

translations.literal: Thereupon he sent his coffin back for burial.

sentences.zh: 至吳，吳王慍曰：「天下同宗，死長安即葬長安，何必來葬為！」

translations.literal: Zhi Wu, Wu wang yun yue: "Tian xia tong zong, si Chang an ji zang Chang an, he bi lai zang wei!"
translations.idiomatic: Arriving at Wu, the King of Wu angrily said: "The realm is same clan, if died in Chang'an then bury in Chang'an, why necessarily come bury!"

sentences.zh: 復遣喪之長安葬。

translations.literal: Again sent the coffin to Chang'an for burial.

sentences.zh: 吳王由此稍失藩臣之禮，稱病不朝。

translations.literal: The King of Wu from this gradually lost vassal minister's etiquette, claimed illness and did not attend court.

sentences.zh: 京師知其以子故稱病不朝，驗問實不病，諸吳使來，輒系責治之。

translations.literal: The capital knew he claimed illness because of his son and did not attend court, verified and asked truly not ill, all Wu envoys who came were arrested and punished.

sentences.zh: 吳王恐，為謀滋甚。

translations.literal: The King of Wu feared, his plotting increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 及後使人為秋請，上復責問吳使者，使者對曰：「王實不病，漢系治使者數輩，以故遂稱病。

translations.literal: Ji hou shi ren wei qiu qing, shang fu ze wen Wu shi zhe, shi zhe dui yue: "Wang shi not bing, Han xi zhi shi zhe shu bei, yi gu sui cheng bing.
translations.idiomatic: When later sent people to request autumn audience, the emperor again questioned the Wu envoys, the envoys replied: "The king truly not ill, Han arrests and punishes envoys several times, therefore finally claimed illness.

sentences.zh: 且夫『察見淵中魚，不祥』。

translations.literal: Qie fu "cha jian yuan zhong yu, not xiang".
translations.idiomatic: Moreover 'inspecting and seeing fish in the abyss is inauspicious.'

sentences.zh: 今王始詐病，及覺，見責急，愈益閉，恐上誅之，計乃無聊。

translations.literal: Now the king first feigned illness, when discovered, saw the questioning urgent, increasingly withdrew, feared the emperor would execute him, plans then helpless.

sentences.zh: 唯上棄之而與更始。」

translations.literal: Wei shang qi it yet yu geng shi."
translations.idiomatic: Only if your majesty abandons him and lets him start anew."

sentences.zh: 於是天子乃赦吳使者歸之，而賜吳王几杖，老，不朝。

translations.literal: Thereupon the emperor pardoned the Wu envoys and returned them, moreover granted the King of Wu staff and mat, old, not attend court.

sentences.zh: 吳得釋其罪，謀亦益解。

translations.literal: Wu got released from his crime, plotting also increasingly relaxed.

sentences.zh: 然其居國以銅鹽故，百姓無賦。

translations.literal: But residing in the kingdom with copper salt reasons, the people had no taxes.

sentences.zh: 卒踐更，輒與平賈。

translations.literal: When completing the military service, always gave fair value.

sentences.zh: 歲時存問茂材，賞賜閭里。

translations.literal: Seasonally visited and asked about worthy talents, rewarded and granted neighborhoods.

sentences.zh: 佗郡國吏欲來捕亡人者，訟共禁弗予。

translations.literal: Other commandery kingdom officials who wanted to come capture fugitives, he petitioned together to forbid and not give them.

sentences.zh: 如此者四十餘年，以故能使其眾。

translations.literal: Like this for over forty years, therefore able to command his multitude.

sentences.zh: 晁錯為太子家令，得幸太子，數從容言吳過可削。

translations.literal: Chao Cuo served as crown prince's household steward, got favored by the crown prince, repeatedly leisurely spoke that Wu's faults could be reduced.

sentences.zh: 數上書說孝文帝，文帝寬，不忍罰，以此吳日益橫。

translations.literal: Repeatedly memorialized to persuade Emperor Wen, Emperor Wen lenient, not willing to punish, therefore Wu increasingly arrogant.

sentences.zh: 及孝景帝即位，錯為御史大夫，說上曰：「昔高帝初定天下，昆弟少，諸子弱，大封同姓，故王孽子悼惠王王齊七十餘城，庶弟元王王楚四十餘城，兄子濞王吳五十餘城：封三庶孽，分天下半。

translations.literal: Ji Xiao Jing Di ji wei, Cuo wei yu shi da fu, shuo shang yue: "Xi Gao Di chu ding tian xia, kun di shao, zhu zi ruo, da feng tong xing, gu wang nie zi Dao Hui wang wang Qi seventy yu cheng, shu di Yuan wang wang Chu forty yu cheng, xiong zi Bi wang Wu fifty yu cheng: feng three shu nie, fen tian xia ban.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Jing ascended, Cuo became imperial censor, spoke to the emperor: "Formerly Emperor Gao initially pacified the realm, brothers few, sons weak, greatly enfeoffed same surname, therefore enfeoffed bastard son Dao Hui Wang to rule Qi over seventy cities, younger brother Yuan Wang to rule Chu over forty cities, brother's son Bi to rule Wu over fifty cities: enfeoffed three bastard sons, divided half the realm.

sentences.zh: 今吳王前有太子之郄，詐稱病不朝，於古法當誅，文帝弗忍，因賜几杖。

translations.literal: Now the King of Wu previously had crown prince enmity, feigned illness and did not attend court, by ancient law should be executed, Emperor Wen could not bear it, therefore granted staff and mat.

sentences.zh: 德至厚，當改過自新。

translations.literal: Virtue extremely thick, should have reformed and started anew.

sentences.zh: 乃益驕溢，即山鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，誘天下亡人，謀作亂。

translations.literal: But increasingly arrogant, then mountain cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, lured realm fugitives, plotted to rebel.

sentences.zh: 今削之亦反，不削之亦反。

translations.literal: Now reduce it also rebel, not reduce it also rebel.

sentences.zh: 削之，其反亟，禍小；

translations.literal: Xue it, qi fan ji, huo xiao;
translations.idiomatic: Reduce it, its rebellion quick, calamity small;

sentences.zh: 不削，反遲，禍大。」

translations.literal: Not xue, fan chi, huo da."
translations.idiomatic: Not reduce, rebellion slow, calamity great."

sentences.zh: 三年冬，楚王朝，晁錯因言楚王戊往年為薄太后服，私姦服舍，請誅之。

translations.literal: Third year winter, Chu king attended court, Cuo therefore spoke that Chu king Wu previous year for Empress Bo mourned, privately illicit in mourning residence, requested to execute him.

sentences.zh: 詔赦，罰削東海郡。

translations.literal: Imperial decree pardoned, punished by reducing Donghai commandery.

sentences.zh: 因削吳之豫章郡、會稽郡。

translations.literal: Therefore reduced Wu's Yuzhang commandery, Huiji commandery.

sentences.zh: 及前二年趙王有罪，削其河閒郡。

translations.literal: And previous two years Zhao king had crime, reduced his Hejian commandery.

sentences.zh: 膠西王卬以賣爵有姦，削其六縣。

translations.literal: Jiaoxi king Ang because selling ranks had corruption, reduced his six counties.

sentences.zh: 漢廷臣方議削吳。

translations.literal: Han court ministers just discussing reducing Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞恐削地無已，因以此發謀，欲舉事。

translations.literal: King Wu Bi feared reducing territory endless, because of this aroused plotting, wanted to raise affairs.

sentences.zh: 念諸侯無足與計謀者，聞膠西王勇，好氣，喜兵，諸齊皆憚畏，於是乃使中大夫應高誂膠西王。

translations.literal: Considered feudal lords none sufficient to plot with, heard Jiaoxi king brave, liked valor, loved soldiers, all Qi feared him, thereupon sent court gentleman Ying Gao to tempt Jiaoxi king.

sentences.zh: 無文書，口報曰：「吳王不肖，有宿夕之憂，不敢自外，使喻其驩心。」

translations.literal: Wu wen shu, kou bao yue: "Wu wang not xiao, have su xi zhi you, not gan zi wai, shi yu qi huan xin."
translations.idiomatic: No written document, orally reported: "The King of Wu unworthy, has day and night worries, dares not exclude himself, sent to explain his joyful heart."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「何以教之？」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "He yi jiao it?"
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "How to instruct him?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「今者主上興於姦，飾於邪臣，好小善，聽讒賊，擅變更律令，侵奪諸侯之地，徵求滋多，誅罰良善，日以益甚。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Jin zhe zhu shang xing yu jian, shi yu xie chen, hao xiao shan, ting chan zei, shan bian geng lv ling, qin duo zhu hou zhi di, zheng qiu zi duo, zhu fa liang shan, ri yi yi shen.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Now the ruler arises from villainy, adorned by evil ministers, likes petty goodness, listens to slanderers and traitors, arbitrarily changes laws and commands, invades and seizes feudal lords' lands, demands increasingly many, executes and punishes the good and worthy, daily increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 里語有之，『舐糠及米』。

translations.literal: Li yu you it, "shi kang ji mi".
translations.idiomatic: Neighborhood saying has it, 'licking bran reaches rice.'

sentences.zh: 吳與膠西，知名諸侯也，一時見察，恐不得安肆矣。

translations.literal: Wu and Jiaoxi are famous feudal lords, at once seen investigated, fear cannot peacefully indulge.

sentences.zh: 吳王身有內病，不能朝請二十餘年，嘗患見疑，無以自白，今脅肩累足，猶懼不見釋。

translations.literal: The King of Wu personally has internal illness, cannot attend court audience over twenty years, often troubled by suspicion, no way to clear himself, now shrugs shoulders piles feet, still fears not seen released.

sentences.zh: 竊聞大王以爵事有適，所聞諸侯削地，罪不至此，此恐不得削地而已。」

translations.literal: Qie wen da wang yi jue shi have shi, suo wen zhu hou xue di, zui not zhi ci, ci kong bu de xue di er yi."
translations.idiomatic: Secretly heard your majesty because of rank affairs had error, heard feudal lords reduced lands, crime not reach this, this fears not only reducing land."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「然，有之。

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Ran, have it.
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Yes, there is that.

sentences.zh: 子將柰何？」

translations.literal: Zi jiang nai he?"
translations.idiomatic: You will do what?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「同惡相助，同好相留，同情相成，同欲相趨，同利相死。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Tong e xiang zhu, tong hao xiang liu, tong qing xiang cheng, tong yu xiang qu, tong li xiang si.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Same evil mutually assist, same good mutually detain, same emotion mutually accomplish, same desire mutually hasten, same benefit mutually die.

sentences.zh: 今吳王自以為與大王同憂，願因時循理，棄軀以除患害於天下，億亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Jin Wu wang zi yi wei yu da wang tong you, yuan yin shi xun li, qi qu yi chu huan hai yu tian xia, yi yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the King of Wu himself considers with your majesty same worry, wishes following time complying with principle, abandoning body to eliminate calamity harm for the realm, perhaps also possible?"

sentences.zh: 王瞿然駭曰：「寡人何敢如是？

translations.literal: Wang ju ran hai yue: "Gua ren he gan ru shi?
translations.idiomatic: The king startled and alarmed said: "I dare be like this?

sentences.zh: 今主上雖急，固有死耳，安得不戴？」

translations.literal: Jin zhu shang sui ji, gu you si er, an bu de dai?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the ruler though urgent, firmly have death, how not wear crown?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「御史大夫晁錯，熒惑天子，侵奪諸侯，蔽忠塞賢，朝廷疾怨，諸侯皆有倍畔之意，人事極矣。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Yu shi da fu Cuo, ying huo tian zi, qin duo zhu hou, bi zhong sai xian, chao ting ji yuan, zhu hou jie have bei pan zhi yi, ren shi ji.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Imperial censor Chao Cuo, bewilders the emperor, invades feudal lords, blocks loyal secludes worthy, court hates resents, feudal lords all have rebellion intention, human affairs extreme.

sentences.zh: 彗星出，蝗蟲數起，此萬世一時，而愁勞聖人之所以起也。

translations.literal: Comet appears, locusts repeatedly arise, this ten thousand generations one time, moreover sorrow labors sage person arises reason.

sentences.zh: 故吳王欲內以晁錯為討，外隨大王後車，彷徉天下，所鄉者降，所指者下，天下莫敢不服。

translations.literal: Therefore the King of Wu wants internally with Cuo as target, externally follows your majesty's rear chariot, wandering the realm, where faces descend, where points submit, realm none dare not serve.

sentences.zh: 大王誠幸而許之一言，則吳王率楚王略函谷關，守滎陽敖倉之粟，距漢兵。

translations.literal: If your majesty truly fortunate and permits one word, then the King of Wu will lead Chu king attack Hangu pass, guard Xingyang Aocang grain, resist Han troops.

sentences.zh: 治次舍，須大王。

translations.literal: Arrange secondary quarters, await your majesty.

sentences.zh: 大王有幸而臨之，則天下可并，兩主分割，不亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Da wang have xing er lin it, then tian xia ke bing, liang zhu fen ge, not yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Your majesty has fortune and arrives there, then realm can unify, two rulers divide territory, not also possible?"

sentences.zh: 王曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Shan."
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Good."

sentences.zh: 高歸報吳王，吳王猶恐其不與，乃身自為使，使於膠西，面結之。

translations.literal: Gao returned reported to King Wu, King Wu still feared he not participate, then personally as envoy, went to Jiaoxi, face bound him.

sentences.zh: 膠西群臣或聞王謀，諫曰：「承一帝，至樂也。

translations.literal: Jiao xi qun chen or wen wang mou, jian yue: "Cheng yi Di, zhi le.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi ministers some heard king's plot, advised: "Supporting one emperor, extremely happy.

sentences.zh: 今大王與吳西鄉，弟令事成，兩主分爭，患乃始結。

translations.literal: Now your majesty with Wu west face, younger brother commands affairs succeed, two rulers divide contend, calamity then begins knot.

sentences.zh: 諸侯之地不足為漢郡什二，而為畔逆以憂太后，非長策也。」

translations.literal: Zhu hou zhi di bu zu wei Han jun shi er, yet wei pan ni yi you tai hou, not chang ce."
translations.idiomatic: Feudal lords' lands not sufficient as Han commanderies ten two, yet for rebellion to worry empress dowager, not long strategy."

sentences.zh: 王弗聽。

translations.literal: The king not listened.

sentences.zh: 遂發使約齊、菑川、膠東、濟南、濟北，皆許諾，而曰「城陽景王有義，攻諸呂，勿與，事定分之耳」。

translations.literal: Sui fa shi yue Qi, Zi chuan, Jiao dong, Ji nan, Ji bei, jie xu nuo, yet yue "Cheng yang Jing wang have yi, gong Zhu Lv, wu yu, shi ding fen it er".
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon sent envoys allied Qi, Zichuan, Jiaodong, Jinan, Jibei, all promised agreement, moreover said "Chengyang Jing Wang has righteousness, attacked various Lü, do not participate, affairs settled divide it".

sentences.zh: 諸侯既新削罰，振恐，多怨晁錯。

translations.literal: Feudal lords already newly reduced punished, aroused fear, much resented Cuo.

sentences.zh: 及削吳會稽、豫章郡書至，則吳王先起兵，膠西正月丙午誅漢吏二千石以下，膠東、菑川、濟南、楚、趙亦然，遂發兵西。

translations.literal: When reduced Wu Huiji, Yuzhang commandery document arrived, then King Wu first raised troops, Jiaoxi first month Bingwu executed Han officials two thousand stone and below, Jiaodong, Zichuan, Jinan, Chu, Zhao also so, thereupon sent troops west.

sentences.zh: 齊王後悔，飲藥自殺，畔約。

translations.literal: Qi king later regretted, drank medicine suicide, broke alliance.

sentences.zh: 濟北王城壞未完，其郎中令劫守其王，不得發兵。

translations.literal: Jibei king city walls broken not complete, his attendant colonel forced guarded his king, could not send troops.

sentences.zh: 膠西為渠率，膠東、菑川、濟南共攻圍臨菑。

translations.literal: Jiaoxi as canal leader, Jiaodong, Zichuan, Jinan together attacked surrounded Linzi.

sentences.zh: 趙王遂亦反，陰使匈奴與連兵。

translations.literal: Zhao king thereupon also rebelled, secretly sent Xiongnu connected troops.

sentences.zh: 七國之發也，吳王悉其士卒，下令國中曰：「寡人年六十二，身自將。

translations.literal: Qi guo zhi fa, Wu wang xi qi shi zu, xia ling guo zhong yue: "Gua ren nian sixty two, shen zi jiang.
translations.idiomatic: Seven kingdoms' uprising, King Wu assembled all his soldiers, issued order in kingdom: "I aged sixty-two, personally lead.

sentences.zh: 少子年十四，亦為士卒先。

translations.literal: Youngest son aged fourteen, also as soldier vanguard.

sentences.zh: 諸年上與寡人比，下與少子等者，皆發。」

translations.literal: Zhu nian shang yu gua ren bi, xia yu shao zi deng zhe, jie fa."
translations.idiomatic: All ages above equal to me, below equal to youngest son, all mobilize."

sentences.zh: 發二十餘萬人。

translations.literal: Mobilized over twenty thousand people.

sentences.zh: 南使閩越、東越，東越亦發兵從。

translations.literal: South sent Minyue, Dongyue, Dongyue also sent troops followed.

sentences.zh: 孝景帝三年正月甲子，初起兵於廣陵。

translations.literal: Emperor Jing third year first month Jiazi, initially raised troops at Guangling.

sentences.zh: 西涉淮，因并楚兵。

translations.literal: West crossed Huai, thereby united Chu troops.

translations.literal: Zhou Qiu one night got thirty thousand people, sent people report Wu king, then led his troops north attacked cities.

translations.literal: Er yue zhong, Wu wang bing ji po, bai zou, yu shi tian zi zhi zhao jiang jun yue: "Gai wen wei shan zhe tian bao zhi yi fu;
translations.idiomatic: Second month middle, Wu king troops already broken, defeated fled, thereupon emperor formulated decree generals: "Generally heard do good ones heaven repays with fortune;

translations.literal: Do wrong ones heaven repays with calamity.

sentences.zh: 高皇帝親表功德，建立諸侯，幽王、悼惠王絕無後，孝文皇帝哀憐加惠，王幽王子遂、悼惠王子卬等，令奉其先王宗廟，為漢藩國，德配天地，明并日月。

translations.literal: High emperor personally commended merit virtue, established feudal lords, King You, King Dao Hui cut off no descendants, Emperor Wen pitied bestowed favor, enfeoffed King You son Sui, King Dao Hui son Ang etc., ordered serve their former king ancestral temples, be Han border states, virtue match heaven earth, brightness equal sun moon.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞倍德反義，誘受天下亡命罪人，亂天下幣，稱病不朝二十餘年，有司數請濞罪，孝文皇帝寬之，欲其改行為善。

translations.literal: Wu king Bi doubled virtue rebelled righteousness, lured received realm fugitives criminals, disordered realm currency, claimed illness not attend court over twenty years, officials repeatedly requested Bi crime, Emperor Wen lenient him, wished his change conduct do good.

sentences.zh: 今乃與楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠約從反，為逆無道，起兵以危宗廟，賊殺大臣及漢使者，迫劫萬民，夭殺無罪，燒殘民家，掘其丘冢，甚為暴虐。

translations.literal: Now moreover with Chu king Wu, Zhao king Sui, Jiaoxi king Ang, Jinan king Bi Guang, Zichuan king Xian, Jiaodong king Xiong Qu allied from rebel, be contrary without way, raised troops endanger ancestral temples, bandit killed great ministers and Han envoys, forced robbed ten thousand people, prematurely killed innocent, burned destroyed people homes, dug their grave mounds, very violent cruel.

sentences.zh: 今卬等又重逆無道，燒宗廟，鹵御物，朕甚痛之。

translations.literal: Now Ang etc. moreover repeated contrary without way, burned ancestral temples, plundered imperial objects, I very pained it.

sentences.zh: 敢有議詔及不如詔者，皆要斬。」

translations.literal: Liang filial king feared, sent six generals attack Wu, moreover defeated Liang two generals, soldiers all returned fled Liang.

translations.literal: Liang repeatedly sent envoys report Tiaohou seek rescue, Tiaohou not permitted.

sentences.zh: 又使使惡條侯於上，上使人告條侯救梁，復守便宜不行。

translations.literal: Moreover sent envoys slander Tiaohou to emperor, emperor sent people tell Tiaohou rescue Liang, again guarded discretion not go.

translations.literal: Liang sent Han Anguo and Chu dead affairs chancellor younger brother Zhang Yu as generals, then got considerably defeat Wu troops.

sentences.zh: 吳兵欲西，梁城守堅，不敢西，即走條侯軍，會下邑。

translations.literal: Wu troops wanted west, Liang city defense firm, dared not west, then ran Tiaohou army, met Xiayi.

sentences.zh: 欲戰，條侯壁，不肯戰。

translations.literal: Wanted battle, Tiaohou walled, not willing battle.

sentences.zh: 吳糧絕，卒饑，數挑戰，遂夜奔條侯壁，驚東南。

translations.literal: Wu grain exhausted, soldiers hungry, repeatedly challenged, then night ran Tiaohou wall, startled southeast.

sentences.zh: 條侯使備西北，果從西北入。

sentences.zh: 吳大敗，士卒多饑死，乃畔散。

translations.literal: Wu greatly defeated, soldiers many hungry died, then rebelled scattered.
